title: Tribalism in the 21st Century
author: Rishabhakrishna Narendranath
summary: A deep-dive into the impact social media and the internet as a whole makes on human interaction.
content: Political Polarization. That is the name of the plague that affects nations all across the globe. A plague that increases the difficulty of cooperation in governments every day.

title: Good Ol' American Normalcy Bias
author: Rishabhakrishna Narendranath
summary: As Americans, we have become increasingly unaware of how bad living conditions are in certain countries outside the US.
content: In the words of Dr. Lauren Braithwaite,
